title: Stunning Modern Loft!  Office, Deck, Upgrades, Views & LOCATION!
posting_body: Stunning spacious loft with 1 bed / 1.5 baths at Yerba Buena Lofts!
Soaring ceilings, high-end designer upgrades, freshly painted, new Washer and Dryer, oversized walk-in closet, balcony, amenities, deeded parking, separate deeded storage and a great location!
* Available August 15, No Pets & PARKING INCLUDED!
Light wood floors, designer lighting, oversized closet, modern ceiling fan, office nook with balcony with SF VIEWS!
24-hour security which oversees concierge key service, package delivery, dry cleaning, and cabs.
Full-time maintenance staff and chief engineers.
Designed by renowned architect Stanley Saitowitz who has been featured in the New York Times, American Institute of Architects, and Architectural Record.
San Francisco Magazine called YBL “by far the best building South of Market” and San Francisco’s “Best of the Best”.
Folsom @ 4th Street across from restaurants Zero Zero, Oola, Jamber and Mathilde Bistro.
One block from Whole Foods & Yerba Buena Gardens.
Near Moscone Center, K&L Wines, Target and Westfield Mall.
Walking distance from Union Square, Financial District, South Beach, Mission Bay & AT&T Park and the new connector station coming soon at 4th Street!
